definition: A person who utilizes goods or services, typically in the context of purchasing or consuming products. This term is commonly used in the field of economics and consumer protection.

examples.german: Der Verbraucher hat das Recht auf Rückgabe.
examples.english: The consumer has the right to return.

examples.german: Der Verbraucherzentrale hilft den Verbrauchern bei Problemen.
examples.english: The consumer center helps consumers with problems.
The consumer price index measures inflation.
